resources.string:
Instructions:
 1. Connect your device and receiving device to the same Wi-Fi network
 2. Tap "Start Screen Cast" and grant permissions
 3. Use the Stream URL in VLC or any RTSP player:
 • VLC: Media → Open Network Stream → Enter URL
 • FFplay: ffplay rtsp://[IP]:8554/screen
 4. Tap "Stop Cast" when finished
